fields.information_text:
Please note that we are trialing a new format for the participant information and consent form. To view the current approved version of the PICF, please visit https://www.angelmanregistry.info/. Thank you.

Parent/Carer/ Guardian Information

Global Angelman Syndrome Registry

Protocol Number: HREC/13/MHS/76

Project Sponsor: Foundation for Angelman Syndrome Therapeutics Australia

Coordinating Principal Investigator: A/Prof Honey Heussler, Children’s Health Queensland Hospital and Health Services, Brisbane
Email: h.heussler@health.qld.gov.au
Phone: + 61(7) 3163 1636

Site Principal Investigator: Professor Matthew Bellgard, Queensland University of Technology, Brisbane
Email: matthew.bellgard@qut.edu.au
Phone: +61(7) 3138 9749

Registry curator: Megan Tones, Queensland University of Technology, Brisbane
Email: curator@angelmanregistry.info

Welcome to the Global Angelman Syndrome Registry.

Please watch this video before you decide to take part. You may also wish to show this video to other people involved in caring for your child or adult with AS including relatives, friends or clinicians. Note that this is an example video. The proposed transcript can be found here.

If you have any questions or are worried about something, please contact the registry curator:
Megan Tones (registry curator), Queensland University of Technology, Brisbane
Email: curator@angelmanregistry.info

Read transcript

Fact sheet: About the Global Angelman Syndrome Registry here. Note this directs to a google drive folder. We will have links set up properly on the live site when approved.

Fact sheet: What information do I need to provide? here. Note this directs to a google drive folder. We will have links set up properly on the live site when approved

Fact sheet: What happens to my data? here. Note this directs to a google drive folder. We will have links set up properly on the live site when approved
